title: [Gameplay] Snowday Malzahar backing bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
whenever you back as Snowday Malzahar a bug will occur with his mini poro minion he holds in his back in which it will become a blob of blue instead of its normal colors.

How to create this bug:
1. Pick Snowday Malzahar skin
2. press the back button(b) and recall.

Examples of what happens:
http://imgur.com/a/6J79D

replies.body:
Hey AGT ShadesTM! 

Thanks so much for this awesome report - images and repro steps are always super helpful for us! ^-^

Looks like this little dude is missing his texture. We're aware of the issue and working on a fix!
that god someone else has seen this! I shall bump the post
